text: أَمْ لَهُمْ نَصِيبٌ مِّنَ ٱلْمُلْكِ فَإِذًا لَّا يُؤْتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا

translation.en.sahih: Or have they a share of dominion? Then [if that were so], they would not give the people [even as much as] the speck on a date seed.
translation.id.indonesian: Ataukah ada bagi mereka bahagian dari kerajaan (kekuasaan)? Kendatipun ada, mereka tidak akan memberikan sedikitpun (kebajikan) kepada manusia.
